items.sentence: Tom and I usually talked to each other in French.
What\'s the difference between jam and marmalade?
Tom and I sat on the beach watching the seagulls.
Tom and I used to visit each other every weekend.
Tom and Mary are going to get married next month.
Tom and Mary are still not talking to each other.
Tom had meat loaf and mashed potatoes for dinner.
Tom is the president of the local astronomy club.
Tom accepted Mary\'s challenge to a tennis match.
Tom didn\'t want to have anything to do with you.
Someone needs to talk to Tom about what happened.
Have you finished your preparations for the trip?
Have you gotten used to eating Japanese food yet?
Have you told everyone where the meeting will be?
Tom is much a much faster runner than I ever was.
Tom knows a girl who can speak French quite well.
Tom knows a lot of professional baseball players.
I want a car, but I don\'t have money to buy one.
I want everyone to know that I\'m not a murderer.
What\'s the best way to learn a foreign language?
